title: Senior PHP/CakePHP
description:
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

•	Programming of products of our own and our business partners
•	Build network and servers required these products above 
•	Source code review
•	Ensure software quality
•	Educate the other members
•	In charge of Scrum master
requirements:
Required
•	Strong entrepreneurship
•	Strong mind to improve software quality
•	Strong mind to keep learning new technology
•	Experience & skill of PHP of framework cakePHP
•	Experience & skill of PHP of framework React/React Native
•	Experience of PHPUnit
•	Experience of Scrum process
•	Experience of source code review
•	Experience to build & maintain mid-size of Linux servers
•	Experience to develop or operate non-stop system
